name: Reduced Resolution Dataset File
summary: Learn about .RRD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: RRD files are commonly generated from raster data in GeoTIFF .TIF files or JPEG 2000 .JP2 files.

description: GIS file created by geospatial processing programs such as ERDAS IMAGINE and ArcGIS Desktop; stores a reduced dataset from an original raster image using pyramid layers, which speed up the display of raster maps; often used for saving discrete zoom levels on a map.
